name: Michelada (Spicy Mexican Beer)
description: This is a fiery, easy-to-make Michelada recipe that is a great option for anyone disappointed in the watered down versions on the market.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a thin layer of salt to small plate along with dashes of chipotle powder.  Combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a thin layer of salt to small plate along with dashes of chipotle powder.  Combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Rub a lime wedge around the rim of the glass and dredge it in the salt.  (I usually only rub the lime around half of the glass.)
recipeInstructions.name: Rub a lime wedge around the rim of the glass and dredge it in the salt.  (I usually only rub the lime around half of the glass.)

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 teaspoons of hot sauce (Valentina) to the glass, along with the juice of 1 lime, 1/4 teaspoon horseradish sauce, freshly cracked black pepper, and a splash of adobo sauce (optional).
